start.text: Forget not that our errand is holy and just! Light will prevail!
Light, grant me the strength to overcome whatever appears on our path.

start_boss.text: Unholy foulness! I will take you with me!

retreat.text: Light preserve us. The twilight deepens.
We must away! They drive out the light!

need_help.text: This formation is weak. Surely we shall perish.
There is blackness here! Cannot let it touch me!

pursuing.text: Stake the bonfire and tie the noose - justice is nigh!
Light grace my strikes! Turn away the blackness!

running.text: I-I am not retreating! This is a counter-advance!

hull_90.text: The darkness sent them! They are emissaries of death!

hull_30.text: Why now, facing death, do I crave a different life?
AAAGH! No... No! We must away! It is too powerful!

overload.text: Gods, no! You've left us open!

death.text: I give myself to the light...
Is this to be my last battle?

victory.text: GLORY AND HONOR! Ever thus to be brave, my friends!
